channel.title: Looking for a host for a custom deltascape source
channel.description:
I have been working on deltascape source for around 2 weeks. I have fixed all the bugs, changed barrows, added alot of new training area's and fixed pc, added pc rewards. Added a giant mole mini game etc. Custom home, custom shops.
My friend was hosting it for a while but he moved house and his internet won't be on for a couple weeks so i'm looking for a new host.
- Must host atleast 23 hours a day. - Must have portfowarded, or connect to the net without a router or wireless internet.
